definition-item.definition-title: ARRANGEMENTS OF HEATING, COOLING, VENTILATING OR OTHER AIR-TREATING DEVICES SPECIALLY ADAPTED FOR PASSENGER OR GOODS SPACES OF VEHICLES

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements or adaptations of heating, cooling, ventilating or other air treating devices specially for passengers or goods in spaces of vehicles.
Only inventions, that relate exclusively to vehicles are covered by this subclass.
Devices providing other air treatment (humidifying, dehumidifying, scenting, filtering) B60H3/00
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Garments or clothes including a HVAC
Ventilating solely by opening windows, doors, roof parts or the like
Heating or ventilating devices for vehicle seats independent from the vehicle HVAC
Window or windscreen cleaners using air, e.g. defrosters
Heat exchangers comprising heat generating means
Heating, cooling or ventilating batteries or accumulators and independent from the cabin HVAC

section-body.paragraph-text: Refrigerated goods vehicles: B60P if the vehicle aspect is pertinent
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Heating, Ventilating and Air Conditioning (devices or systems)

definition-item.definition-title: Heating, cooling or ventilating {[HVAC]} devices (heating, cooling or ventilating devices providing other air treatment, the other treatment being relevant, B60H3/00; ventilating solely by opening windows, doors, roof parts, or the like B60J; heating or ventilating devices for vehicle seats B60N2/56; vehicle window or windscreen cleaners using air, e.g. defrosters, B60S1/54)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Heating, cooling and/or ventilating (HVAC) devices for the air inside a vehicle cabin or a load area.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for other treatment of air (e.g. scenting, moistening, drying, filtering)

section-body.paragraph-text: B60H1/00 and subgroups: vehicle specific documents
B60H1/32 and subgroups: refrigerant circuit and component specific documents

definition-item.definition-title: {for load cargos on load transporting vehicles}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Structure of HVAC units the vehicle, air ducts.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: If refrigeration circuit features are characterizing

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {HVAC devices specially adapted for particular vehicle parts or components and being connected to the vehicle HVAC unit}

section-body.paragraph-text: Heating/cooling liquid urea for exhaust gas treatment:
F01N3/2066 and Indexing Code F01N2610/11 cool, F01N2610/10 heat.

definition-item.definition-title: {for the battery (arrangement of batteries B60R16/04)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Battery cooling and/or heating linked to the vehicle interior air conditioning circuit.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: When the battery cooling circuit is completely separate from the cabin air conditioner

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
If there is an additional evaporator for cooling the battery in an airstream, also classify in B60H1/323.

definition-item.definition-title: {Arrangements permitting a rapid heating of the heating liquid (B60H1/00492, B60H1/03 take precedence; aiding engine start by heating of engine coolants F02N19/10)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Software for engine control related to temperature: F02D41/00
Heating engine with electric means: F02N19/04

definition-item.definition-title: {Heat exchangers for air-conditioning devices (B60H1/3227 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Heat exchangers per se: F28D, F28F

definition-item.definition-title: {of the liquid-air type}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Coolant / air heat exchangers are classified here.
Convectors: F28F1/14, F28F1/16, F28F1/18
In houses: F24D19/04

definition-item.definition-title: {of the gas-air type (B60H1/18 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Refrigerant / air heat exchangers are classified here
This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {of the liquid-liquid type}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Refrigerant / water or refrigerant / refrigerant or water/water heat exchangers, e.g. stacked plates.

definition-item.definition-title: {Air-conditioning arrangements specially adapted for particular vehicles}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
HVAC characterized by features related to the type of vehicle are classified here and in the subclasses.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {for caravans or trailers}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
HVAC for camping trailers, recreational vehicles and other trailers.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: HVAC for load transport vehicle trailers (aspects of the trailer)
HVAC for load transport vehicle trailers (aspects of the refrigeration unit itself)

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {for vehicles carrying large numbers of passengers, e.g. buses}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
HVAC specific to all road vehicles carrying more passengers than a standard passenger car.
This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {for tractor or load vehicle cabins}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {for vehicles having an electrical drive, e.g. hybrid or fuel cell}

section-body.paragraph-text: When batteries or fuel cells are cooled or heated: B60H1/00278
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: When the fuel cell is used for driving the AC components only

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Electric vehicles with batteries or fuel cells

definition-item.definition-title: {for electric vehicles having only electric drive means}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Vehicles driven by an electric motor. Includes fuel cell vehicles and vehicles having a combustion motor only for generating electric power ("range extender").
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: When electric and hybrid vehicles are mentioned equally
If a fuel cell is used only for driving a HVAC

definition-item.definition-title: {for vehicles having a combustion engine and electric drive means, e.g. hybrid electric vehicles}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
All hybrid vehicles where the combustion engine can be mechanically coupled to the wheels for vehicle propulsion.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: When electric and hybrid vehicles are mentioned equally

definition-item.definition-title: {for open or convertible vehicles}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Vehicles having body parts that can be opened (e.g. convertibles, golf carts) and this affects the air conditioning system.
Seats: B60H1/00285
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {for military, emergency, safety or security vehicles}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Vehicles like ambulances, tanks, anti bacteriological warfare vehicles etc. where the air conditioning system is specially adapted to the use of the vehicle (e.g. germ filters, pressurized cabin).
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {electric}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Aspects of power supply (e.g. use of converters / inverters) to drive components (e.g. compressors) of the HVAC.
Solar power and fuel cell power used for air conditioning when the vehicle drive is not electric.
Domestic air conditioning using natural energy, see F24F5/0046
Semiconductor Solar Cells per se: Photovoltaic modules H10F19/00
This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {Ventilation unit, e.g. combined with a radiator (control systems for ventilators B60H1/00828)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Fans in combination with other components of the HVAC unit, e.g. with heat exchangers.
Ventilators in general: F04D15/0005, F04D25/08
Electrical motors: H02K
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Air-conditioning devices using the Peltier effect (for air-conditioning in general F24F5/0042; for refrigeration F25B21/02; electric devices exhibiting the Peltier effect H10N10/00)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Thermoelectric modules (based on the Peltier or Seebeck effect) in HVAC units are classified here.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Thermoelectric modules in fuel burning heaters

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Valves for air-conditioning devices, e.g. thermostatic valves (valves per se F16K; thermostatic valves per se G05D23/02)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Vehicle HVAC characterized by specially adapted valves for refrigerant and/or coolant.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {comprising regenerative heating or cooling means, e.g. heat accumulators}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
HVAC units comprising accumulators storing heat or both heat and cold are classified here.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: If only cold storage is included in the HVAC
Cold storages used in domestic HVAC

definition-item.definition-title: {Mounting or fastening of components in housings, e.g. heat exchangers, fans, electronic regulators}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Mounting heat exchangers in vehicle bodies

definition-item.definition-title: {the housing or parts thereof being integrated in other devices, e.g. dashboard}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {of air ducts}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Dashboards, e.g. with integrated air ducts
Ducting arrangements for domestic air treatment

definition-item.definition-title: {of liquid ducts, e.g. for coolant liquids or refrigerants}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Pipes, joints of fittings per se
Flexible pipes with four or more layers, e.g. for refrigerants
Couplings with fluid cut-off means using two valves

definition-item.definition-title: {Means for monitoring, testing or servicing the air-conditioning}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Service units for servicing the vehicle HVAC.
Includes units for purging, evacuating, filling and testing such an HVAC.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Add-on devices, e.g. heat/cooling boxes, compartment dividers, upgrade sets}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Receptacles connected to the vehicle HVAC for cooling or heating.
Partition elements used inside the vehicle cabin for separating a cooled or heated compartment.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Receptacles for food or beverages with refrigerating or warming systems:

definition-item.definition-title: {Control members, e.g. levers or knobs (B60H1/00985 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Construction or arrangement of damper doors (control systems or circuits for damper doors B60H1/00835)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Air flow control members for domestic air-conditioning

definition-item.definition-title: {Control systems or circuits characterised by their input, i.e. by the detection, measurement or calculation of particular conditions, e.g. signal treatment, dynamic models}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {by detection of the vehicle occupants' presence; by detection of conditions relating to the body of occupants, e.g. using radiant heat detectors}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {the input being solar radiation}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {the input being a vehicle driving condition, e.g. speed (B60H1/00828, B60H1/00864 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Control systems using vehicle speed as input.
B60H1/3208 if control of the compressor is based on the vehicle speed.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: If the vehicle position is characterizing

definition-item.definition-title: {the input being a vehicle position or surrounding, e.g. GPS-based position or tunnel}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Specially adapted for navigation in a road network

definition-item.definition-title: {the input being air quality}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Damper doors, e.g. position control (construction or arrangement of damper doors B60H1/00664; B60H1/00864 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Means (levers, gears...) for moving doors see B60H1/00857

definition-item.definition-title: {characterised by the means connecting the initiating means, e.g. control lever, to the damper door}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Drive means for doors etc are classified here.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Controlling the flow of liquid in a heat pump system (controlling the properties of the refrigerant liquid, e.g. pressure or temperature, B60H1/3204)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: The system uses a heat pump

definition-item.definition-title: {Control systems or circuits characterised by failure of detection or safety means; Diagnostic methods}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Methods for detection of insufficient refrigerant charge (when performed by the vehicle itself) are classified here.
See B60H1/3233 for compressor saving methods.
F25B2700/04 (B60H): detecting the charge level of refrigerant
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for Testing HVAC are classified in

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Safety devices for refrigeration machines, e.g. level control of refrigerant

abbreviations.paragraph-text: In patent documents, the following abbreviations are often used:

definition-item.definition-title: {Control systems or circuits characterised by display or indicating devices, e.g. voice simulators (characterised by the input of sound using a voice synthesizer B60H1/00757; B60H1/00978 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Display or monitoring for domestic air-conditioning

definition-item.definition-title: the heat being derived from the propulsion plant {(B60H1/00492 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: The use of heat of electric motors

definition-item.definition-title: {from the cooling liquid of the propulsion plant and from a viscous fluid heater}

section-body.paragraph-text: If no cooling water of the engine is used, then classify in B60H2001/146
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: otherwise than from cooling liquid of the plant {, e.g. heat from the grease oil, the brakes, the transmission unit (B60H1/03 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {the heat being derived from cooling an electric component, e.g. electric motors, electric circuits, fuel cells or batteries}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The source of heat is waste heat from electric components.
If an electric heater is provided: B60H1/2215

definition-item.definition-title: the heat being derived otherwise than from the propulsion plant {(B60H1/0025, B60H1/00492 and B60H1/03 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {the heat being derived from burners (burners in general F23C, F23D, F24H9/18)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Fuel burning heaters with evaporation means

definition-item.definition-title: {the heat being derived from electric heaters}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Supply of electric power to heating circuits in electric vehicles
Electric resistance heating for domestic use

definition-item.definition-title: {controlling the operation of electric heaters}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Helically or spirally coiled water heaters with electrical energy supply

definition-item.definition-title: {arrangements of electric heaters for heating an intermediate liquid (B60H1/034 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Water heaters specially adapted for vehicle systems
Air heaters using electric energy supply

definition-item.definition-title: {characterised by the location of ventilation devices in the vehicle}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Ventilating systems in a vehicle characterized by the position of the nozzles relative to the vehicle.

definition-item.definition-title: {Disposition of several air-diffusers in a vehicle for ventilation-air circulation in a vehicle cabin}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {using one-way valves}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Air-flow control members with movable members for domestic air-conditioning

definition-item.definition-title: Ventilating openings in vehicle exterior; Ducts for conveying ventilating air

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Openings in or on the vehicle roof}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: the openings being situated directly in front of vehicle front window

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {using absorption or adsorption}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {using evaporation, i.e. not including a compressor, e.g. involving fuel or water evaporation (B60H1/3235 takes precedence; in general F25B19/00, F25D7/00)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machines using evaporation of refrigerant without recovery of the vapour
Devices using evaporation without recovery of the vapour

Heat-exchange apparatus having stationary conduit assemblies for one heat-exchange medium only, the media being in contact with different sides of the conduit wall, using the cooling effect of natural or forced evaporation

definition-item.definition-title: {using compression (B60H1/3233 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cooling devices characterised by condensed liquid drainage means

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cooling devices using compression, in general

definition-item.definition-title: {characterised by the compressor driving arrangements, e.g. clutches, transmissions or multiple drives (B60H1/3208, B60H1/3226 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Hybrid compressor drives (mechanic and electric) are classified here
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Vehicle drive related control of the compressor drive means

definition-item.definition-title: {characterised by comprising auxiliary or multiple systems, e.g. plurality of evaporators, or by involving auxiliary cooling devices}

section-body.paragraph-text: If batteries are cooled, use B60H1/00278.

definition-item.definition-title: {particularly adapted for load transporting vehicles (B60H1/3226 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Refrigerant units for truck cargo space
B60H1/00014 if the aspects of the vehicle are characterizing.
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {characterised by condensed liquid drainage means}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Nozzles; {Air-diffusers} (dispositions of air diffusers in a vehicle B60H1/247)

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Outlets for directing or distributing air into rooms or spaces for domestic air-conditioning
Air-flow control members, e.g. louvres, grilles or flaps for domestic air-conditioning

definition-item.definition-title: {Outlets providing a vortex, i.e. a spirally wound air flow}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Other air-treating devices

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Devices for treating air inside or flowing into a cabin or load area of a vehicle, characterized by other aspects than heating, cooling or ventilation.
These aspects are e.g: Scenting, Deodorizing, Ionizing, Humidity control, Filtering.
Control methods using detection of air quality or humidity as input: B60H1/00735.

definition-item.definition-title: {Adding substances other than water to the air, e.g. perfume, oxygen}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Air treatment other than cooling or heating in domestic air-conditioning systems

definition-item.definition-title: {Electrically conditioning the air, e.g. by ionizing}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Smell or pollution preventing arrangements (B60H3/0007, B60H3/0071, B60H3/02, B60H3/06 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Cleaning or disinfecting of the interior of the HVAC for preventing or removing smell or malodour, e.g. malodour caused by fungi or accumulated dirt.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Methods or apparatus for disinfecting or sterilising materials or objects other than foodstuffs or contact lenses

definition-item.definition-title: Moistening {; Devices influencing humidity levels, i.e. humidity control (B60H1/3202, B60H1/3207 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: Means for reducing or increase of air humidity.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Domestic air-conditioning systems with air treatment by humidification or dehumidification

definition-item.definition-title: Filtering {(B60H3/0078 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Cleaning outside or recirculated air entering the vehicle cabin by the use of filters.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cleaning the environmental atmosphere (not the air for the cabin) by a filter in a vehicle

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangement or mounting of filters for domestic air-conditioning
